articles.title: ChatGPT launches pilot group chats across Japan, New Zealand, South Korea, and Taiwan
articles.summary: The ChatGPT maker describes this pilot as just a “small first step” toward creating a more "shared experience" in the app.  The private chats and personal ChatGPT memory stay completely private.
articles.content: The ChatGPT maker describes this pilot as just a “small first step” toward creating a more "shared experience" in the app. The private chats and personal ChatGPT memory stay completely private. Group chats are invitation-only, and members can leave at any time.
articles.author: Kate Park

articles.title: OpenAI’s new LLM exposes the secrets of how AI really works
articles.summary: ChatGPT maker OpenAI has built an experimental large language model that is far easier to understand than typical models.  That’s a big deal, because today’s LLMs are black boxes: Nobody fully underst.
articles.content: ChatGPT maker OpenAI has built an experimental large language model that is far easier to understand than typical models. That’s a big deal, because today’s LLMs are black boxes: Nobody fully understands how they do what they do. Building a model that is more transparent sheds light on how LLMs work
articles.author: Will Douglas Heaven

articles.title: Google’s SIMA 2 agent uses Gemini to reason and act in virtual worlds
articles.summary: “SIMA 2 is a more general agent.  It can complete complex tasks in previously unseen environments.
articles.content: “SIMA 2 is a more general agent. It can complete complex tasks in previously unseen environments. And it's a self-improving agent... which is a step toward more genera- purpose robots and AGI systems more generally.”
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
